texts.name: Infernity Patriarch (Manga)
texts.desc: When you have no cards in your hand and this card is in your GY: 1 monster you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.

texts.name: Galaxy Dragon (Manga)
texts.desc: If your opponent controls "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon", this card gains 1000 ATK. If this card attacks "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon", that monster has its effects negated until the end of the Damage Step.

texts.name: Dragon Buster
texts.desc: Target 1 "Galaxy Dragon" on the field; it gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn's Battle Phase. If that "Galaxy Dragon" destroys a "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" by battle this turn: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK that destroyed "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" had on the field.

texts.name: Sea Lord's Amulet (Anime)
texts.desc: While this card is face-up on the field, WATER monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. Destroy this card during the End Phase of the turn this card was activated.

texts.name: Golden Homunculus (Anime)
texts.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each of your banished cards.

texts.name: Ectoplasmer (Anime)
texts.desc:
Once per turn, during the Main Phase: The turn player can declare 2 Monster Card names, and if they do, this card gains this effect for the rest of this turn.
● During the Main Phase: The turn player can Tribute 1 declared monster, and if they do, their opponent can Tribute 1 monster with the same name, otherwise inflict damage to their opponent equal to half the Tributed monster's ATK on the field.
texts.str1: Transform into ectoplasm to prevent damage?

texts.name: Battlin' Boxer Cheat Commissioner (Anime)
texts.desc:
2 Level 3 monsters
When this card battles: Change the battle position of all monsters on the field to face-up Attack Position, then you can have another monster you control battle instead. When a monster battles another monster, except this card: You can detach all Xyz Materials from this card; look at your opponent's hand, then if there is a Spell Card(s) in their hand, you can target 1 of those Spell Cards and end the Battle Phase, then activate the targeted Spell Card.
texts.str2: Target 1 Spell in opp's hand, end BP and activate?

texts.name: Call of the Earthbound (Manga)
texts.desc: Can only be activated at the start of the opponent's Battle Phase. Target 1 monster your opponent controls; that monster must attack, if able.

texts.name: Dark Archetype (Anime)
texts.desc: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can send any number of monsters from your hand to the Graveyard, then Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with ATK equal to the battle damage you took and Level equal to the total Levels of monsters sent to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Meklord Emperor Granel ∞ (Anime)
texts.desc: Other monsters you control cannot attack. This card's original ATK becomes equal to your LP. Once per turn: You can target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card. This card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of all Synchro Monsters equipped to it. When this card is destroyed, destroy all monsters you control.

texts.name: Vow of the Sword
texts.desc: If you control a Warrior-Type monster: Special Summon 1 Level 4 Warrior-Type monster from your hand.

texts.name: Gagaga Cowboy (Anime)
texts.desc:
1 EARTH Level 4 monster + 1 Level 4 monster
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; apply this effect, depending on this card's battle position.
● Attack Position: Until the end of the Battle Phase of this turn, this card gains 1000 ATK, also if this card battles an opponent's monster, that monster loses 500 ATK during the Damage Step only.
● Defense Position: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.
